title: Kazimierz_Karabasz-Polska_Szkola_Dokumentu_09of10-Portret_w_krop
description: Kazimierz Karabasz is a key figure in the history of polish documentary film. He is to our cinematography what Robert Flaherty, John Grierson and Dziga Vertov were to american, british ans russian documentary film and his vision has become a benchmark for nyone engaged in the polish cinema in fact. Karabasz has been making documentaries for half a century, probing around relentessly to find better ways of bringing home the reality of day-to-day existance. The author of groundbreaking films, such as "The Musicians" and "A Year in the life of Franek W.", he is the an outstanding international artist, who assidously documents his experience as a documentary filmmaker in his theoretic work. As a lector at the Lodz film academy, he has also through the years nurtured exceptional documentary-making talent such as Krysztof Kieslowski, Marcel Lozinski, Tomaz Zygaldo, Tadeusz Palka and Andreas Titkow.
